#summary How to install Debian using debootstrap

= Installing sid from knoppix or any other Debian live CD = 

{{{
mkfs.xfs -f /dev/sda2
mkdir /tmp/target
mount /dev/sda2 /tmp/target
debootstrap sid /tmp/target http://ftp.cz.debian.org/debian/
chroot /tmp/target
}}}
create /etc/fstab:
{{{
/dev/hda1 none swap
/dev/hda2 / xfs defaults 0 0
/proc      /proc       proc   defaults            0 0
/sys       /sys        sysfs  noauto              0 0
/dev/cdrom      /cdrom          iso9660 ro,user,noauto          0       0
}}}
mount proc and sys:
{{{
mount /proc
mount /sys
}}}
install kernel:
{{{
apt-get update
apt-get install linux-image-2.6.16-1-686
}}}
create /etc/network/interfaces:
{{{
auto lo
iface lo inet loopback

auto eth0
iface eth0 inet dhcp
}}}
edit /etc/hostname:
{{{
pierre
}}}
create /etc/hosts:
{{{
127.0.0.1 localhost pierre
}}}
install [grub], reboot.
